name: Poly Survivor
description:
3D Graphics, Simple Operation
Poly Survivor is a roguelike casual indie game with 3D graphics and super simple operation. Players will control their characters to continuously fire barrages and enjoy the fun of clearing out enemies in large numbers.

Various Environments
Players need to fight in environments such as winds and swamps. These environments not only affect players, but also monsters. Players will explore how to survive in various environments during the game.

Powerful Monsters
Players not only have to clear out the swarms of monsters, but also need to challenge and defeat several elite monsters. These elite monsters with different skills should be handled carefully.

Please send email to bestqgame@gmail.com or bestqgame@163.com if you have any advice or bugs to report. The author looks forward to communicating with players and will sincerely accept suggestions!
